result.markdown:
--- title: "Clase teórica Semana 13" subtitle: "pruebas bivariadas" author: "Marylia Cruz" date: "2025-06-09" format: html execute: echo: true message: false df-print: paged code-annotations: hover --- # Abrir la base de datos ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(rio) data=import("data/Data_ejemplo_comunica.xlsx") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} names(data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "N" "Nivel de procastinacion" [3] "RedSocial" "Tiempo en redes sociales" [5] "Le gusta Leer" "Numero de interacciones diarias" [7] "Numero de Seguidores" ``` ::: ::: # Prueba T de student ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} t.test(`Tiempo en redes sociales` ~ `Le gusta Leer`, data = data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Welch Two Sample t-test data: Tiempo en redes sociales by Le gusta Leer t = 20.31, df = 170.27, p-value < 2.2e-16 alternative hypothesis: true difference in means between group NO and group SI is not equal to 0 95 percent confidence interval: 160.4916 195.0484 sample estimates: mean in group NO mean in group SI 277.61 99.84 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(dplyr) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Attaching package: 'dplyr' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': filter, lag ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following objects are masked from 'package:base': intersect, setdiff, setequal, union ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(lsr) tabla=data%>% group_by(`Le gusta Leer`)%>% summarise( promedio=mean(`Tiempo en redes sociales`), linferior=ciMean(`Tiempo en redes sociales`)[1], lsuperior=ciMean(`Tiempo en redes sociales`)[2] ) tabla ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: # Gráfico de prueba T ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(ggplot2) ggplot(tabla, aes(x = `Le gusta Leer`, y = promedio)) + geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = linferior, ymax = lsuperior), width = 0.2) + labs(x = "Le gusta leer o no", y = "Media ± IC 95%") + theme_minimal() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](semana13_teoria_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: # Prueba Anova ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} anova=aov(`Numero de Seguidores` ~`RedSocial`,data=data) summary(anova) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value Pr(>F) RedSocial 2 1470386 735193 153 <2e-16 *** Residuals 197 946705 4806 --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 ``` ::: ::: # Gráfico de prueba Anova ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(dplyr) library(lsr) tabla=data%>% group_by(`RedSocial`)%>% summarise( promedio=mean(`Numero de Seguidores`), linferior=ciMean(`Numero de Seguidores`)[1], lsuperior=ciMean(`Numero de Seguidores`)[2] ) tabla ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(ggplot2) ggplot(tabla, aes(x = RedSocial, y = promedio)) + geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = linferior, ymax = lsuperior), width = 0.2) + labs(x = "Grupo", y = "Media ± IC 95%") + theme_minimal() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](semana13_teoria_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: # Prueba de Correlación ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} cor.test(data$`Numero de Seguidores`,data$`Numero de interacciones diarias`) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Pearson's product-moment correlation data: data$`Numero de Seguidores` and data$`Numero de interacciones diarias` t = 20.181, df = 198, p-value < 2.2e-16 alternative hypothesis: true correlation is not equal to 0 95 percent confidence interval: 0.7690670 0.8610325 sample estimates: cor 0.8202829 ``` ::: ::: # Gráfico de dispersión ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(ggplot2) ggplot(data, aes(x = `Numero de Seguidores`, y = `Numero de interacciones diarias`)) + geom_point() + labs(title = "Diagrama de dispersión", x = "Eje X", y = "Eje Y") + theme_minimal() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](semana13_teoria_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
